arts.ttl: Former Premier League duo Scott McTominay and Romelu Lukaku fire Napoli to the top of Serie A with win at Fiorentina - with pair scoring past ex-Man United team-mate David de Gea!
arts.sum: Former Premier League outcasts Scott McTominay and Romelu Lukaku have propelled Napoli to the top of Serie A , proving their worth after turbulent spells in England.

arts.ttl: Romelu Lukaku and Scott McTominay help Napoli climb to top of Serie A
arts.sum: The former Manchester United team-mates were both on the scoresheet at the Artemio Franchi.

arts.ttl: Napoli set to make move for Liverpool’s Federico Chiesa
arts.sum: In a surprising turn of events, Napoli are preparing to make an offer for Liverpool's Federico Chiesa. The Italian international, who has struggled to find his footing at Anfield, could be set for a return to Serie A on a six-month loan deal. The post Napoli set to make move for Liverpool’s Federico Chiesa appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Palladino reflects on Fiorentina’s heavy defeat to Napoli
arts.sum: Fiorentina manager Raffaele Palladino offered his thoughts following his team's 3-0 loss to Napoli in Serie A. Despite the disappointing scoreline, Palladino remained optimistic about his young squad's potential for growth. The post Palladino reflects on Fiorentina’s heavy defeat to Napoli appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Fiorentina 0-3 Napoli: Match Report
arts.sum: Napoli secured their position as sole leaders of Serie A with a commanding 3-0 victory over Fiorentina at the Stadio Artemio Franchi. The match saw David Neres, Romelu Lukaku, and Scott McTominay all find the back of the net for the Partenopei.
